title: Rabbit and pancetta pot pies
description: I kept rabbits as a child and I was so distraught when a fox ate them, I didn’t eat rabbit until my thirties! I’ve found it makes a great pie filling when combined with a little pancetta, to balance its leanness. Make this warming, hearty dish during autumn and winter when you’ll really appreciate it and rabbit is at its best.Equipment and preparation: you will need four individual pie dishes.
ingredients: 65g/2¼oz cold, unsalted butter, cut into 5-10mm cubes
